en_question:
At the beginning of the year, Hongdou Garment Factory launched a new fashion product. Based on experience and market research, the predicted demand for this product over the next six months is as follows: 
 January:3,000 units, February:3,600 units, March:4,000 units, April: 4,600 units, May:4,800 units, June:5,000 units 
 Each unit requires 4 hours of skilled labor and 150 dollars worth of raw materials to produce. The selling price is 240 dollars per unit. 
 At the beginning of January, the factory has 80 skilled workers, each working 160 hours per month. To meet production needs, the factory can recruit and train new workers. Training a new worker takes 50 hours of a skilled worker’s time for instruction, and the training period lasts one month, after which the trainee can become a skilled worker. Skilled workers are paid 2,000 dollars per month. Trainees receive a living allowance of 800 dollars during the training month. After completing training, new workers receive the same salary and work efficiency as skilled workers. Each month, 2\% of skilled workers (including those newly trained and on the job for at least one month) leave due to various reasons. 
 The factory starts the year with 400 units of inventory and requires that the ending inventory in June not exceed 100 units. Additionally, if garments are not delivered in the month of production, they incur a storage cost of 10 dollars per unit per month. Design a labor and production plan for the factory that satisfies the monthly and end-of-June inventory requirements, while maximizing the total revenue from January to June.
cn_question:
红豆服装厂新推出一款时装，根据经验和市场调查，预测今后6个月对该款时装的需求为：
1 月——3 000 件，2 月——3 600 件，3 月——4 000 件，4 月——4 600 件，5 月——4 800 件，6 月——5 000 件。
生产每件需熟练工人工作 4h，耗用原材料 150 元。售价为 240 元/件。该厂 1 月初有熟练工 80 人，每人每月工作 160h。为适应生产需要，该厂可招收新工人培训，
但培训一名新工人需占用熟练工人 50h 用于指导操作，培训期为一个月，结束后即可上岗。
熟练工人每月工资 2 000 元，新工人培训期给予生活补贴 800 元，转正后工资与生产效率同熟练工人。
又熟练工人（含转正一个月后的新工人）每月有 2\% 因各种原因离职。已知该厂年初加工出 400 件该款时装作为库存，
要求 6 月末库存不超过 100 件。又每月生产出来的时装如不在当月交货，库存费用为每件每月 10 元。
试为该厂设计一个满足月及 6 月末存货要求，又使 1—6 月总收入为最大的劳动与生产方案。
